snippet.title: Souldiers - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Souldiers will be released on June 2nd on PC, PlayStation, Xbox and Switch! 🥳
Explore, hone your skills and fight for your freedom in this unforgiving 2D Metroidvania developed by Retro Forge Game. 👉 Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/3i1P7fn

Choose among 3 classes of fighters and explore Terragaya along your fellow soldiers in a quest to find your way back into your world. ⚔️🧙🏹
